text:
Farming in the Bronx: A farmer plowing his field on the east side of Ferris Avenue, between Philip and Randall Avenues.

July 24, 1928

P. L. Sperr

(2) A scene on the north side of E. Gunhill Road, between Boston Road and Givan Avenue.

June 1, 1928

P.L. Sperr

(3) Farming in the Bronx: An orchard on West Farms Road, north of E. 173rd Street.

May 31, 1928

P. L. Sperr
